hero.title_rest: Data Engineer Based In Sri Lanka
hero.description: I am a Data Engineer from, Jaffna Sri Lanka. I am searching for a Job.

about.title: About Me
about.para1: I am a skilled Data Engineer with a strong background in designing and building scalable data pipelines. My expertise lies in transforming raw data into actionable insights, ensuring data reliability, and optimizing data architecture for performance and efficiency.
about.para2: My passion for Data Engineering drives me to solve complex data challenges, from constructing efficient ETL processes to managing large-scale data warehouses. I am committed to leveraging the latest technologies to deliver robust data solutions that empower business decision-making.

items.name: Data Pipeline Construction
items.desc: Designing and building robust, scalable data pipelines to ingest, process, and move data efficiently across diverse systems.

items.name: ETL/ELT Processes
items.desc: Developing and managing Extract, Transform, Load (ETL) and ELT workflows to ensure high-quality data availability for analysis.

items.name: Data Warehousing
items.desc: Architecting and optimizing data warehouses to store large volumes of structured and unstructured data for reporting and analytics.

items.name: Database Optimization
items.desc: Tuning database performance, designing schemas, and managing database health to ensure fast and reliable data access.

items.name: Cloud Data Solutions
items.desc: Implementing and managing data infrastructure on cloud platforms like AWS, Azure, or GCP to ensure scalability and security.

items.name: Data API Development
items.desc: Building secure and efficient APIs to expose data to applications, enabling seamless integration and data consumption.

contact.title: Get In Touch
contact.desc: I am currently available to take on new project, So feel free a message about anything that you want me to work on. You can Contact anytime.

footer.desc: I am a fullstack developer from, SriLanka with 1+ years of experiance in fullstack development.
